thread.title: Sports: Silver and Black Bras for a Cause Benefit Set for 11 October 2015
thread.title_full: Sports: Silver and Black Bras for a Cause Benefit Set for 11 October 2015

author: Michael Taylor
title: Sports: Silver and Black Bras for a Cause Benefit Set for 11 October 2015
text:
Sports: Silver and Black Bras for a Cause Benefit Set for 11 October 2015 
American Football 
The Silver and Black Republic will hold its 2nd Annual Breast Cancer Benefit Event on Sunday 11 October 2015 at Dave and Busters in Ontario, California, as the Oakland Raiders take on the Denver Broncos. Voiceover Artist and LA Weatherman Garth Kemp. 

Voiceover Artist and long-time LA Weatherman Garth Kemp will be the Master of Ceremonies at the 2nd Annual Bras for a Cause fundraiser at Dave and Buster's in Ontario, California, on Sunday 11 October 2015. 
Dave and Buster's will roll out the Pink Carpet as the Oakland Raiders face off against their arch-rivals, the Denver Broncos, at Oaktown's notorious Black Hole in week 5 of the 2015 NFL season. 
There is no long lost between the Oakland Raiders, who are going into the game with a 2 and 2 record, and the Denver Broncos, who are 4 and zilch. 
The Silver and Black Republic, which is organizing the fund-raising event, is expecting a big turnout so make sure to get there early. 
Raider fans attending the charity fundraiser are asked to donate a pink bra with a Raiders theme. 
Donations will be collected during the game. Bras will be auctioned off to the highest bidder. 100% of proceeds will benefit the Cancer Society of the Inland Empire. 
Click here for the rules . 
All reserved seating has already been taken, but Dave and Busters will open a general seating area, which will accommodate an additional 45 to 50 fans. 
The doors will open at 12.30 pm, so get there early! Kickoff is scheduled for 1.25 pm (Pacific Daylight Time). 
Where
